com.shizhefei.db.database

类 NameDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.shizhefei.db.database.NameDBHelper
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DBHelper

    public class NameDBHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
implements DBHelper
    实现DBHelper 继承SQLiteOpenHelper
    子类可以通过继承该类进行监听数据库版本的变化，和数据库创建,用法参照( android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper)
    作者:
    Administrator
